results.description: Substitute Shea Gordon scores twice for 10-man Partick Thistle as they beat Morton to record their first home Scottish Championship win since April.
results.shortTitle: Thistle record first home win of season
results.title: Partick Thistle 2-1 Greenock Morton: Hosts record first home win of season

results.description: Craig Moore fires a double as Ayr United ensure a miserable return for former boss Ian McCall as they prove too strong for Partick Thistle.
results.shortTitle: Ayr thrash Thistle on McCall return
results.title: Ayr Utd 4-1 Partick Thistle: Ian McCall loses on Somerset return

thumbnail.altText: Ayr United congratulate two-goal hero Craig Moore

results.description: Ayr United boss Mark Kerr speaks about his introduction to management as he prepares to face Partick Thistle and former manager Ian McCall on Saturday.
results.shortTitle: 'Nobody knows what I've done. I'm ready for it' - Ayr boss Kerr on management
results.title: Ayr United boss Mark Kerr speaks about his introduction to management

results.description: Dundee United maintain their three-point lead at the top of the Scottish Championship after Lawrence Shankland's 17th goal of the season earned victory over Partick Thistle.
results.shortTitle: Shankland goal earns Utd win over Thistle
results.title: Dundee Utd 1-0 Partick Thistle: Lawrence Shankland goal earns leaders win

results.description: Partick Thistle remain bottom of the Championship table after losing at home to Arbroath.
results.shortTitle: Partick remain bottom after Arbroath defeat
results.title: Partick Thistle 1-3 Arbroath: Ian McCall's side still bottom

thumbnail.altText: Arbroath's Liam Donnelly (right) celebrates his goal to make it 1-0

results.description: Dundee concede three times in the last five minutes to lose at home to Partick Thistle in the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Late Dundee collapse as Partick win
results.title: Dundee 1-3 Partick Thistle: Late collapse from home side

results.description: Gary Caldwell says he deserved more time as Partick Thistle manager and dismisses rumours of player unrest.
results.shortTitle: 'I'm more suited to Scotland job' - Caldwell
results.title: Gary Caldwell: 'I'm more qualified to manage Scotland than Partick Thistle'

results.description: Inverness Caledonian Thistle's quest for a third Challenge Cup success continues with a home quarter-final against Clyde.
results.shortTitle: Inverness CT host Clyde in Challenge Cup
results.title: Scottish Challenge Cup quarter-final draw: Inverness CT at home to Clyde

thumbnail.altText: Partick Thistle travel to Stenhousemuir in the last eight

results.description: Darren Brownlie's first goal in 18 months brought Queen of the South a valuable Scottish Championship win at Partick Thistle.
results.shortTitle: Queens inflict defeat on McCall's home bow
results.title: Partick Thistle 0-1 Queen of the South: Brownlie the hero for Queens

results.description: Partick Thistle beat Inverness Caledonian Thistle to secure their first win of the Championship season in Ian McCall's first game as manager.
results.shortTitle: Partick win in McCall's first game
results.title: Inverness CT 1-3 Partick Thistle

results.description: Holders Celtic ease past Partick Thistle to win their 29th successive domestic cup tie and set up a Scottish League Cup semi-final with Hibernian.
results.shortTitle: Celtic ease into League Cup semi-finals
results.title: Celtic 5-0 Partick Thistle: Olivier Ntcham double helps Celtic into last four

thumbnail.altText: Jonny Hayes, Olivier Ntcham and Scott Brown celebrate a Celtic goal

results.description: A Partick Thistle fans group - backed by EuroMillions winner Colin Weir - has made an offer to take control of the Scottish Championship club.
results.shortTitle: Weir-backed fans group makes Thistle bid
results.title: Partick Thistle: Colin Weir-backed fans group makes takeover bid

results.description: Test your Scottish League Cup knowledge as eight teams do battle in the quarter-finals
results.shortTitle: League Cup quarter-final quiz
results.title: Scottish League Cup: Test your knowledge

results.description: Ian McCall becomes Partick Thistle manager for the second time after leaving Scottish Championship rivals Ayr United.
results.shortTitle: McCall appointed Partick Thistle manager
results.title: Partick Thistle: Ian McCall appointed manager after Ayr United exit

results.description: Ayr United boss Ian McCall is set to become Partick Thistle manager for the second time.
results.shortTitle: McCall set to return as Thistle manager
results.title: Partick Thistle: Ian McCall poised to leave Ayr United for Firhill return

results.description: Partick Thistle have approached Ayr United about bringing Ian McCall back to the club for a second spell and are rebuffed by Clyde in an attempt to speak to Danny Lennon.
results.shortTitle: Thistle want to bring McCall back
results.title: Partick Thistle: Ayr United's Ian McCall is leading contender

results.description: Managerless Partick Thistle slip to bottom place in the Scottish Championship after being thumped by Dunfermline Athletic.
results.shortTitle: Managerless Thistle bottom after rout
results.title: Partick Thistle 0-3 Dunfermline Athletic: Manager-less Thistle bottom after Pars dominate

results.description: Gary Caldwell has been sacked as the manager of Partick Thistle, the club have confirmed.
results.shortTitle: Caldwell sacked as Partick Thistle boss
results.title: Gary Caldwell sacked as Partick Thistle boss

results.description: Arbroath move into third in the Scottish Championship while Partick Thistle are off the bottom after a 1-1 draw at Gayfield.
results.shortTitle: Arbroath and Partick Thistle draw 1-1
results.title: Scottish Championship: Partick Thistle off bottom after draw away to Arbroath

thumbnail.altText: Partick Thistle striker Kenny Miller (left) celebrates

results.description: All the arrivals and departures during summer 2019 in the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Scottish Championship summer ins and outs
results.title: Scottish Championship ins and outs - Summer 2019
